snippet.title: Macintosh Game: Battle Chess (1993 MacPlay)
snippet.description:
Battle Chess is a computer game developed and released by Interplay for the Amiga platform in 1988. Subsequently, from 1988 to 1994, it was adapted for other popular platforms, including Mac OS and Windows. Battle Chess implements the idea of live chess in a medieval setting.

Please like this video and subscribe to my channel for more great retro content.

#RetroGames #RetroGaming #OldGames #Abandonware
